_meanings:
{@--2@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>)
Asserting or predicating something
of another, as the subject of an 
assertion, (which then can be put
in the <ab>nom.</ab> case only); 
predication, assertion; See <ls>P. II. 3. 2</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--6@} A dictionary,
vocabulary (of words), lexicon (in
these last {4} senses said to be also
{%<ab>m.</ab>%})

<ab>N.</ab> of a
celebrated vocabulary of synonyms
by Hemacandra.
